about.summary: The 'leaflet' JavaScript library provides many plugins some of which are available in the core 'leaflet' package, but there are many more. It is not possible to support them all in the core 'leaflet' package. This package serves as an add-on to the 'leaflet' package by providing extra functionality via 'leaflet' plugins.

The 'leaflet' JavaScript library provides many plugins some of which are available in the core 'leaflet' package, but there are many more. It is not possible to support them all in the core 'leaflet' package. This package serves as an add-on to the 'leaflet' package by providing extra functionality via 'leaflet' plugins.

name: r-leaflet.extras
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-leaflet.extras
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/leaflet.extras_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/leaflet.extras/leaflet.extras_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fc7b0611e6664d0e3e7e67b2e65555c6029727dc35b74ec0d3e753ce42312752

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1006
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-leaflet >=2.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-stringr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-leaflet >=2.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-stringr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('leaflet.extras')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('leaflet.extras')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/bhaskarvk/leaflet.extras, https://bhaskarvk.github.io/leaflet.extras/
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: The 'leaflet' JavaScript library provides many plugins some of which are available
    in the core 'leaflet' package, but there are many more. It is not possible to support
    them all in the core 'leaflet' package. This package serves as an add-on to the
    'leaflet' package by providing extra functionality via 'leaflet' plugins.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf
